title: Create RoleBinding
description: Create a RoleBinding named ||dev-binding|| in namespace ||development|| that binds the Role ||pod-reader|| to ServiceAccount ||developer||.

validations.command: kubectl get rolebinding dev-binding -n development -o jsonpath='{.roleRef.name}'
kubectl get rolebinding dev-binding -n development -o jsonpath='{.subjects[0].name}'
validations.description: RoleBinding should bind to developer ServiceAccount
